title: what's this extra bold sans serif
content:
Hi, I feel like i’ve seen this alot but can’t seem to figure out what it is

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/artist-banner_5252.jpg)
author: jrwilki

comments.content: Thanks, I had actually run across that one...failed to make the connection. cheers

BTW, this is a serif font.

- Mike Yanega
